"Etoile"

"Etoile is a Successor Class that features strong defensive and support skills.

Etoiles are able to equip Double Sabers, Dual Blades and Wands.

Double Saber
High mobility, with a focus on aerial combat.
Dual Blades
Relentless, unceasing attacks.
Wand
Attacks that allow you to move freely."

"To change to the Etoile class, you must first complete a specific Client Order.

To complete this Client Order, you will need to earn a Title whose conditions are getting 2 or more classes to Lv. 75 or higher."

"Etoile is different from other classes in a number of ways:

・Cannot set a subclass
(If a Quest has level restrictions that refer to your subclass, only consider the level of your main class.)

・Some potentials and Skill Rings have no effect
(E.g. Battle Awakening, R/Attack Advance, etc.)

・Has its own set of level cap release orders
・Support Partners cannot have their class set to Etoile"
"Etoile Double Saber"

"When a Double Saber is equipped by an Etoile, it performs \"Etoile Double Saber\" attacks and PAs instead of normal Double Saber attacks.

Etoile Double Saber has high mobility and strong aerial performance, making it effective for aerial combat.

There are many skills that alter its actions, and you can make yourself more effective in battle by choosing the skills that suit your own fighting style."

"When you learn the skill \"Etoile Double Saber Gear\", a Gear Gauge is added to the top of the Weapon Palette.

The Gear Gauge fills as you attack enemies, and when you take damage, Gear will be consumed to reduce the damage you take.

The more you attack, the better your defenses will be, so don't stop fighting."

"In addition, you can consume your Gear to trigger a powerful attack called \"Enhance Attack\".

It's up to you to assess each battle and decide whether to use your Gear for attack or defence.

Enhance Attack
・Hold the normal attack button to consume one unit of Gear and perform a powerful attack.

※If activated with less than 1 unit of Gear, the attack's power will be reduced."

"Etoile Double Saber can block and even Just Guard enemy attacks with its Weapon Action, \"Deflect\".

If you activate Deflect again after blocking an enemy attack, you will perform a powerful Deflect Combo counterattack.

You can activate Deflect Combo by Deflecting again even if it wasn't a successful Just Guard."

"There are many skills which alter the actions available to Etoile Double Saber. Select your skills carefully and customise your Etoile Double Saber actions in a way that fits your fighting style.

Double Saber Step Slide
・During a Step, use Step again to transition into a smooth movement action that lets you control its direction.
※Movement speed increases while locked on."

"Double Saber Skip Arts
・Use a PA while not entering movement input to skip the first half of the PA.

・Using a PA while entering movement input will work the same as if you hadn't learned this skill."

"Double Saber Quick Take
・After a PA or Weapon Action, use a PA or normal attack when the on-screen guide indicates to approach the enemy at high speed and strike.

Double Saber Step Guard
・Step towards an enemy just as they are about to hit you to Just Guard their attack and perform a high-speed counterattack."
"Etoile Dual Blades"

"When Dual Blades are equipped by an Etoile, they perform \"Etoile Dual Blade\" attacks and PAs instead of normal Dual Blade attacks.

Etoile Dual Blades' Weapon Action, \"Parry\", blocks enemy attacks, and can be activated in the middle of your own attacks, allowing you to chain your own attacks together while retaining the ability to defend yourself at any time."

"The Etoile Dual Blade Weapon Action, Parry, blocks attacks from all directions. If you successfully block an attack, you will strike back against the enemy with a powerful counterattack.

Parry can be used in the middle of PAs, normal attacks and other actions, so you don't have to break your flow in combat to block enemy attacks."

"Step Edge
・Use your Weapon Action during a Step to throw Edges that attack distant enemies.

Use this to adjust your position and make sure your next attack will connect."

"When you learn the skill \"Etoile Dual Blade Gear\", a Gear Gauge is added to the top of the Weapon Palette.

The Gear Gauge fills as you attack enemies. When the Gear Gauge has reached a certain level, you can use a powerful attack called \"Connect\".

In addition, by consuming a full Gear Gauge, you can perform the even more powerful special move \"Full Connect\"."

"Connect
・Use your Weapon Action after Step Edge when the Gear Gauge is at 50% or higher to connect your Edges to your Dual Blades for a powerful, wide-area attack, which consumes 50% of the Gear Gauge.
・When your Gear Gauge is full, use Connect, then use your Weapon Action again to perform an awesomely powerful special attack that consumes your entire Gear Gauge. Use this wisely."
"Etoile Wand"

"エトワールが装備したウォンド
「エトワールウォンド」について説明します。

エトワールウォンドは移動能力に長け
流れるように攻撃を繰り出せることが
特徴です。

また、ＰＡ中にタイミングよく
武器アクションを行うことで
ＰＡの性質が変化する
トリッキーな武器になっています。"

"エトワールウォンドは
ＰＡ中に表示されるガイドに合わせて
武器アクションを押すことで
範囲が狭くなる代わりに、威力の高い攻撃
「フォーカスＰＡ」を放つことができます。

戦況によって通常のＰＡと

"エトワールウォンドは
武器アクションを行うことで
移動も可能なガード「チャージプロテクト」を
発動することができます。

また、「エトワールウォンドギア」を
習得している場合、ギアゲージを消費して
ガード状態を維持することもできます。"

"スキル「エトワールウォンドギア」を
習得することで専用のギアが追加されます。

ギアゲージは以下の行動で
増加させることができます。
・エネミーへの攻撃
・移動
・ジャストガード

ギアゲージはガードの維持で消費し
一定以上消費することで
強力な攻撃「プロテクトリリース」を
発動します。"

"「プロテクトリリース」
・武器アクション「チャージプロテクト」を

\u3000消費した後、武器アクションボタンを離す
自分の周囲へ強力な範囲攻撃を行います。
移動入力を行いながら
プロテクトリリースすることで
攻撃前に高速移動することができます。

※消費したギアゲージに応じて
プロテクトリリースの性能を
強化することが可能です。"

自身だけでなく
周囲のプレイヤーとの連携を意識することで
エトワールのスキルを活用できます。"

アクティブスキルのリキャスト時間を
